H0.text: What was the name of Michael Jackson's second wife. Whitney Houston

H1.text: What was the name of Michael Jackson's second wife. Madonna

H2.text: What was the name of Michael Jackson's second wife. Janet Jackson

H3.text: What was the name of Michael Jackson's second wife. Debbie Rowe

A4.text: Rowe later became Jackson's second wife and the mother of his first two children.

A5.text: During the tour, in Sydney, Australia, Jackson married Debbie Rowe, a dermatology assistant, who was six months pregnant with his first child.
